description: Test cases for interactive map view and session location features

test_cases.name: Display Map with Session Pins
steps: Navigate to Map View from Home screen
test_cases.expected_result: Interactive map displays with session pins at their respective locations

test_cases.name: Session Pin Displays Sport Icon
test_cases.expected_result: Each pin displays the sport icon (üè∏ badminton, ‚öΩ futsal, üéæ tennis)

test_cases.name: Click Session Pin to View Details
test_cases.expected_result: User navigated to session detail screen for that session

test_cases.name: Filter Map by All Sports
test_cases.expected_result: Map shows pins for all sports sessions

test_cases.name: Filter Map by Badminton
test_cases.expected_result: Map shows only badminton session pins

test_cases.name: Filter Map by Futsal
test_cases.expected_result: Map shows only futsal session pins

test_cases.name: Filter Map by Tennis
test_cases.expected_result: Map shows only tennis session pins

test_cases.name: Switch to List View from Map
test_cases.expected_result: User navigated back to Home screen with list view

test_cases.name: Propose Session from Map View
test_cases.expected_result: User navigated to Propose Session screen
